sourcesContent:
<template>
  <ion-page>
    <ion-header :translucent="true">
      <ion-toolbar>
        <IonButtons>
          <ion-back-button :text="messages[idioma]['backText']" />
        </IonButtons>
        <ion-title>{{ messages[idioma]["registerTitle"] }}</ion-title>
      </ion-toolbar>
    </ion-header>

    <ion-content :fullscreen="true" class="ion-padding">
      <ion-list lines="full" class="ion-no-margin">
        <ion-item-group>
          <ion-item-divider>
            <ion-label> Personal </ion-label>
          </ion-item-divider>

          <ion-item>
            <ion-label class="ion-text-wrap">{{
              messages[idioma]["nameTitle"]
            }}</ion-label>
            <ion-input v-model="name" slot="end" type="text"></ion-input>
          </ion-item>

          <ion-item>
            <ion-label class="ion-text-wrap">{{
              messages[idioma]["surnameTitle"]
            }}</ion-label>
            <ion-input v-model="surname" slot="end" type="text"></ion-input>
          </ion-item>
        </ion-item-group>
        <ion-item-group>
          <ion-item-divider>
            <ion-label> General </ion-label>
          </ion-item-divider>

          <ion-item>
            <ion-label class="ion-text-wrap">{{
              messages[idioma]["mailTitle"]
            }}</ion-label>
            <ion-input v-model="mail" slot="end" type="email"></ion-input>
          </ion-item>

          <ion-item>
            <ion-label class="ion-text-wrap">{{
              messages[idioma]["passwordTitle"]
            }}</ion-label>
            <ion-input
              v-model="password"
              slot="end"
              type="password"
            ></ion-input>
          </ion-item>

          <ion-item>
            <ion-label class="ion-text-wrap">{{
              messages[idioma]["confirmPasswordTitle"]
            }}</ion-label>
            <ion-input
              v-model="password2"
              slot="end"
              type="password"
            ></ion-input>
          </ion-item>
        </ion-item-group>
      </ion-list>
      <ion-button class="lgRg_btn" expand="block" @click="startRegister">
        {{ messages[idioma]["registerTitle"] }}
      </ion-button>
    </ion-content>
  </ion-page>
</template>

<script>
import {
  IonContent,
  IonHeader,
  IonPage,
  IonTitle,
  IonToolbar,
  IonButtons,
  IonButton,
  IonBackButton,
  IonList,
  IonLabel,
  IonItem,
  IonItemDivider,
  IonItemGroup,
  IonInput,
  loadingController,
} from "@ionic/vue";
import { defineComponent } from "vue";
import { NativeStorage } from "@ionic-native/native-storage";

import axios from "axios";
import { useRouter } from "vue-router";
import sha256 from "js-sha256";

export default defineComponent({
  name: "RegisterPage",
  components: {
    IonContent,
    IonHeader,
    IonPage,
    IonTitle,
    IonToolbar,
    IonButtons,
    IonBackButton,
    IonButton,
    IonList,
    IonLabel,
    IonItem,
    IonInput,
    IonItemDivider,
    IonItemGroup,
  },
  data: function () {
    return {
      messages: {
        es: require("../../public/assets/i18n/es.json"),
        ca: require("../../public/assets/i18n/ca.json"),
        en: require("../../public/assets/i18n/en.json"),
      },
      idioma: "es",
      control: null,
      name: null,
      surname: null,
      mail: null,
      password: null,
      password2: null,
    };
  },
  setup: function(){
    const router = useRouter();

    const gotoWallet = (mail) => {
      router.push('/main/home/register/seedGeneration?mail=' + mail);
    };

    return { gotoWallet };
  },
  mounted: function () {
    NativeStorage.getItem("idioma").then((x) => (this.idioma = x));
  },
  methods: {
    checkInputs: function () {
      //Check empty values
      if (
        this.name == "" ||
        this.surname == "" ||
        this.mail == "" ||
        this.password == "" ||
        this.password2 == ""
      ) {
        console.log(false);
        return false;
      }

      //Check mail value
      const re = /\S+@\S+\.\S+/;
      if (!re.test(this.mail)) {
        console.log(false);
        return false;
      }

      //Check if passwords match

      if (this.password != this.password2) {
        console.log(false);
        return false;
      }

      //Check password structure and length
      if (
        this.password.match(/[a-zA-Z]/g) &&
        this.password.match(/[0-9]/g) &&
        this.password.match(/[^a-zA-Z\d]/g) &&
        this.password.length >= 8
      ) {
        console.log(true);
        return true;
      } else {
        console.log(false);
        return false;
      }
    },
    startRegister: function () {
      if (this.checkInputs()) {
        loadingController
          .create({
            message: "Confirmando registro...",
          })
          .then((loading) => {
            this.control = loading;
            loading.present();
            axios({
              url: "http://192.168.1.41:3013/registerUser",
              method: "post",
              headers: { Accept: "application/json" },
              data: {
                name: this.name,
                surname: this.surname,
                mail: this.mail,
                password: sha256(this.password),
              },
            })
              .then((response) => {
                console.log(response.data);
                if (response.data == 'OK') {
                  this.control.dismiss();
                  alert(
                    "Registro completado"
                  );
                  this.gotoWallet(this.mail);
                } else {
                  this.control.dismiss();
                  alert(
                    response.data
                  );
                }
              })
              .catch((err) => {
                this.control.dismiss();
                alert("Se ha producido un error: " + err);
              });
          });
      }
    },
  },
});
</script>

<style>
@import "../styles/homeStyle.css";
</style>
